::KitKat::

She turned suddenly as Hell Beast spoke to her.  She drew her rifle 
and aimed it at Hell Beast. "I'd say that your reputation proceeds 
you. I heard that you were dead.  how in the pit did you get back 
here? And what's this abbout investigating Megatron?"
She had just killed Megatron just a little while ago. How could this 
bot know she had killed him so quickly. This was either a trap, 
Bloodystrike or Gotron notified him, he was spying and saw the 
battle, or he had this whole thing planned from the start.  Her 
instincts told her that this whole situation wasn't right.
"Look Hell Beast, You want to look at Megatron's body, that's fine 
with me, but only after I have first crack at it.  I want his spark 
and ananlise his body, then you can have the whole thing to put up on 
the wall as a trophy." She still had her rifle aimed at HellBeast.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, JP3884@a... wrote:
>     Megatron had enough of this, there was no way he could get to 
the pod in 
> time, and his enemies were beginning to suspect something. He 
turned to 
> Waspinator, "You, go to Kitkats position and beg for he to spare a 
body part 
> of mine to you, as a momento. Tell her that I am truly dead, but 
under any 
> circumstances do not tell them that we are residing in the ice 
cavern."
> He said.
>     Waspinator nodded. "Yes Megatron. But what if they hurt me?" He 
said a 
> little uneasy.
>     "Thats your problem. Just throw them off my trail!" He roared 
and sent 
> the little bot buzzing away frantically into the air.
>     Adrax began to clap and got the tyrants attention. "What a 
perfect prison 
> you have selected. If you leave, you'll die. And now your confined 
insdie. 
> You are pathetic Megatron."
>     Without a word, Megatron dropped his cage into the pit, but 
stopped it. 
> It dangled in blackness. Megatron then sealed the top of it. He 
could stay 
> down there awhile.
> 
>     Hell Beast and Gremlin emerged from the woods. Word had it that 
Megatron 
> was dead, and if he was then he could go home. Gremlin pointed as 
they 
> entered the clearing to the old cave, "There they are. Kitkat is in 
charge."
>     The old Commander looked at the leader. She was small, another 
female. 
> Females seemed to be weak leaders, but mabey this one was 
different. 
> "Commander Kitkat, I am Senator Hell Beast. I belive my reputation 
proceeds 
> me, but in any case I have come to investigate the death of the 
criminal 
> Megatron. I mean no trouble and will help you if nessecery."
> 
>     Black Aracnia looked to Quickstrike, "So what do you think 
about the 
> baby....I mean...are you alright with it? Scared?"
